Transparency.findings: Uber publishes detailed information about its AI models, research, and tools on its blog and career pages. The company demonstrates transparency through open-source contributions, model documentation, and public discussion of its AI platform’s evolution and capabilities.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Uber provides concrete evidence of fairness and bias mitigation through dedicated teams, external civil rights assessments, and technical blog posts describing bias removal in production systems. These sources detail both organizational and technical strategies for promoting equity and reducing bias.

summary.overallFindings: Uber Technologies, Inc. demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with concrete evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments. The company provides detailed documentation, open-source tools, and public reports on its AI systems and processes. Dedicated teams and roles, technical frameworks, and external audits further reinforce Uber's commitment to responsible AI. No significant gaps were identified in any pillar, reflecting a mature and well-documented approach to responsible AI.
